verses.verse: לַ֝מְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> [Tle-da-Vid[A Psalm] of David לְהַזְכִּֽיר׃ <WH2142> le-haz-Kir. to bring to remembrance אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him [Make haste] O God לְהַצִּילֵ֑נִי <WH5337> le-hatz-tzi-Le-ni; to deliver יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD לְעֶזְרָ֥תִי <WH5833> le-'ez-Ra-ti to help חֽוּשָֽׁה׃ <WH2363> Chu-Shah. me make haste

יֵבֹ֣שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu Let them be ashamed וְיַחְפְּרוּ֮ <WH2659> ve-yach-pe-Ru and confounded מְבַקְשֵׁ֪י <WH1245> me-vak-Shei that seek נַ֫פְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> naf-Shi after my soul יִסֹּ֣גוּ <WH5472> yis-So-gu let them be turned אָ֭חוֹר <WH268> 'A-chor backward וְיִכָּלְמ֑וּ <WH3637> ve-yik-kal-Mu; and put to confusion חֲ֝פֵצֵ֗י <WH2655> cha-fe-Tzei, that desire רָעָתִֽי׃ <WH7451> ra-'a-Ti. my hurt

יָ֭שׁוּבוּ <WH7725> Ya-shu-vu Let them be turned back עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- for עֵ֣קֶב <WH6118> 'E-kev for a reward בָּשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH1322> ba-she-Tam; of their shame הָ֝אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> ha-'o-me-Rim, that say הֶ֘אָ֥ח׀ <WH1889> he-'Ach Aha הֶאָֽח׃ <WH1889> he-'Ach. aha

יָ֘שִׂ֤ישׂוּ <WH7797> ya-Si-su thee rejoice וְיִשְׂמְח֨וּ׀ <WH8055> ve-yis-me-Chu and be glad בְּךָ֗ be-Cha, כָּֽל־ <WH3605> kal- all מְבַ֫קְשֶׁ֥יךָ <WH1245> me-Vak-Shei-cha Let all those that seek וְיֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> ve-yo-me-Ru say תָ֭מִיד <WH8548> Ta-mid continually יִגְדַּ֣ל <WH1431> yig-Dal be magnified אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; Let God אֹ֝הֲבֵ֗י <WH157> 'o-ha-Vei, in thee and let such as love יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Te-cha. thy salvation

וַאֲנִ֤י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I עָנִ֣י <WH6041> 'a-Ni But I [am] poor וְאֶבְיוֹן֮ <WH34> ve-'ev-yOn and needy אֱלֹהִ֪ים <WH430> E-lo-Him unto me O God חֽוּשָׁ֫ה־ <WH2363> chu-Shah- make haste לִּ֥י li עֶזְרִ֣י <WH5828> 'ez-Ri thou [art] my help וּמְפַלְטִ֣י <WH6403> u-me-fal-Ti and my deliverer אַ֑תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah; O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אַל־ <WH408> 'al- not תְּאַחַֽר׃ <WH309> te-'a-Char. make no tarrying
